pkgmetadata.longdescription: Density Estimation via Bayesian Inference Engines // Bayesian density estimates for univariate continuous random samples are provided using the Bayesian inference engine paradigm. The engine options are: Hamiltonian Monte Carlo, the no U-turn sampler, semiparametric mean field variational Bayes and slice sampling. The methodology is described in Wand and Yu (2020) arXiv:2009.06182.
